snippet.title: Maniac - Announcement Trailer | Best Upcoming Indie Games
snippet.description:
Maniac on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1482380/Maniac/

Survival get-away with an ever-increasing cast of law enforcement. Level up by public property destruction, police kills and pedestrian murders. Classic GTA reimagined as a survival chase action + roguelite elements.
